turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, could i ask you some questions about your movie preferences?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great thanks, what kind of movies do you generally like watching?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can't quite hear you, could you speak closer to the mic?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can help with that. where do you want to order pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get two pizzas. They will both be small. And I want to get a pepperoni pizza with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of pizza do you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please speak closer to the mic, i was unable to hear your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two small pizzas, pepperoni pizzas, with extra cheese on both of.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 2 small pizzas, pepperoni with extra cheese on both.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: two pizzas will be $24. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed, it'll be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome then.
